title: Making waves: The power of concentration gradients - Sasha Wright

What is the starting point of the global conveyor called thermohaline circulation?

options.label: A
options.text: The movement of water molecules from high to low concentrations

options.label: B
options.text: The movement of salt ions from high to low concentrations

options.label: C
options.text: The movement of both water molecules and salt ions from high to low concentrations

options.label: D
options.text: The movement of neither water molecules nor salt ions
